greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number A(n,k) of Dyck paths of semilength n having exactly three (possibly overlapping) occurrences of the consecutive step pattern given by the binary expansion of k, where 1=U=(1,1) and 0=D=(1,-1); square array A(n,k), n>=0, k>=0, read by antidiagonals.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Antidiagonals n = 0..140, flattened
xref: Main diagonal gives A243772 or column k=3 of A243752.
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Jun 11 2014
